name: techno-blast
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this moveâ€™s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
short_effect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
flavor_text: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.
